name: The Lost Princess of Oz
summary: When Princess Ozma mysteriously disappears, four search parties are sent out, one for each of Oz's four countries. Most of the book covers Dorothy and the Wizard's efforts to find her. Meanwhile, Cayke the Cookie Chef discovers that her magic dishpan (on which she bakes her famous cookies) has been stolen. Along with the Frogman, they leave their mountain in Winkie Country to find the pan.
info:
• 中文名: 奥兹国失踪的公主
  • 作者: Lyman Frank Baum
  • 别名: オズの消えたプリンセス
  • 别名: 奥芝玛公主失踪记
  • 出版社: Reilly & Britton
  • 发售日: 1917年
  • 插图: John R. Neill
